name: lex-bot-example
description: Using the AWS SDK for JavaScript V3 to create an Amazon Lex chatbot within a web application.
author: brmur

scripts.build: webpack index.js --mode development --libraryTarget commonjs2 --target web --devtool false -o main.js
scripts.build-cdk: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name STACK_NAME --template-body file://setup.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
